name: Timeless early animation
description: This Constellation traces the inspirations and evolution of the Cuphead animation technique and franchise back to the early 20th century and beyond.

key_work.title: Cuphead: Inspiration from the Inkwell
key_work.brief_description: The charming and cheeky animated characters of Studio MDHR’s Cuphead videogame spring into action in this contemporary incarnation of the popular 19th century invention, the zoetrope.

constellations_primary.name: Timeless early animation
constellations_primary.description: This Constellation traces the inspirations and evolution of the Cuphead animation technique and franchise back to the early 20th century and beyond.

constellations_other.name: Binary images
constellations_other.description: The interiors in Kalonica's Apartment (2021) are rendered in just two colours: white and blue. Like black and white film, this monochromatic art style was first employed due to technological constraints. Many contemporary filmmakers and videogame developers have revisited older techniques like these for artistic effect.

start.title: Cuphead: Inspiration from the Inkwell
start.brief_description: The charming and cheeky animated characters of Studio MDHR’s Cuphead videogame spring into action in this contemporary incarnation of the popular 19th century invention, the zoetrope.

constellations_primary.name: Timeless early animation
constellations_primary.description: This Constellation traces the inspirations and evolution of the Cuphead animation technique and franchise back to the early 20th century and beyond.

constellations_other.name: Binary images
constellations_other.description: The interiors in Kalonica's Apartment (2021) are rendered in just two colours: white and blue. Like black and white film, this monochromatic art style was first employed due to technological constraints. Many contemporary filmmakers and videogame developers have revisited older techniques like these for artistic effect.

end.title: Cuphead
end.brief_description: Cuphead is a classic run and gun action game inspired by cartoons of the 1930s, with the visuals and audio painstakingly created with the same techniques of the era like traditional cel animation, watercolor backgrounds, and original jazz recordings.

constellations_other.name: Over the Technicolor rainbow
constellations_other.description: This Constellation explores the beginning and legacy of Technicolor and was created by Swinburne Cinema and Screen Studies students Adam Virgona and Kristian Vass.

constellations_other.name: MoCaps and rotos
constellations_other.description: Though VFX continues to push boundaries and brings fantastical worlds and creatures to life, there's still a place for classic animation techniques.

constellations_other.name: Timeless early animation
constellations_other.description: This Constellation traces the inspirations and evolution of the Cuphead animation technique and franchise back to the early 20th century and beyond.

links.description: The Cuphead zoetrope merges the early moving image zoetrope technology with the 2017 videogame’s beloved characters and animation style, which were inspired by early 20th-century animation aesthetics.

end.title: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate
end.brief_description: Legendary game worlds and fighters collide in the ultimate showdown—a new entry in the Super Smash Bros. series for the Nintendo Switch featuring new fighters like Inkling from the Splatoon series and Ridley from the Metroid series.

constellations_other.name: Timeless early animation
constellations_other.description: This Constellation traces the inspirations and evolution of the Cuphead animation technique and franchise back to the early 20th century and beyond.

links.description: Cuphead‘s retro style was added into decades of videogame animation designs and fashions when the Cuphead characters joined other iconic videogame heroes in Super Smash Bros. Ultimate.

start.title: Dizzy Dishes
start.brief_description: The Fleischer’s Talkartoon short that debuted the now infamous Betty Boop.

constellations_other.name: Timeless early animation
constellations_other.description: This Constellation traces the inspirations and evolution of the Cuphead animation technique and franchise back to the early 20th century and beyond.

end.title: Nothing But the Truth
end.brief_description: A young man bets $10,000 that for 24 hour he can tell nothing but the truth.

constellations_other.name: Timeless early animation
constellations_other.description: This Constellation traces the inspirations and evolution of the Cuphead animation technique and franchise back to the early 20th century and beyond.

links.description: Betty Boop became a legendary character, though in Dizzy Dishes she was originally a dog! In 1932 she evolved into a human, who Helen Kane – the performer who played in Nothing But The Truth – claimed was based on her… and she was!

end.title: The Cuphead Show!
end.brief_description: Follow the misadventures of the impulsive Cuphead and his cautious but persuadable brother Mugman in this animated series based on the hit video game.

constellations_other.name: Timeless early animation
constellations_other.description: This Constellation traces the inspirations and evolution of the Cuphead animation technique and franchise back to the early 20th century and beyond.

links.description: Cuphead‘s charming, early 20th-century style of animation has proved so popular that the game has been adapted into an animated Netflix series that proved the old-school aesthetic has lasted the ages.

end.title: Out of the Inkwell
end.creator_credit: S. Roy Luby, Max Fleischer and John Randolph Bray
end.brief_description: Out of the Inkwell was a major animated series of the silent era produced by Max Fleischer from 1918 to 1929. - Wikipedia

constellations_other.name: Timeless early animation
constellations_other.description: This Constellation traces the inspirations and evolution of the Cuphead animation technique and franchise back to the early 20th century and beyond.

links.description: It’s fitting a Cuphead TV show has been made, with the series’ style heavily inspired by animation pioneers Fleischer Studios, whose Out of the Inkwell (1918–27) film series established their animation aesthetic.

start.title: Out of the Inkwell
start.creator_credit: S. Roy Luby, Max Fleischer and John Randolph Bray
start.brief_description: Out of the Inkwell was a major animated series of the silent era produced by Max Fleischer from 1918 to 1929. - Wikipedia

end.title: Dizzy Dishes
end.brief_description: The Fleischer’s Talkartoon short that debuted the now infamous Betty Boop.

constellations_other.name: Timeless early animation
constellations_other.description: This Constellation traces the inspirations and evolution of the Cuphead animation technique and franchise back to the early 20th century and beyond.

links.description: Out of the Inkwell introduced the famous Koko the Clown and Fitz the Dog characters, who later appeared in Fleischer’s Talkartoons series. Betty Boop first appeared in the Talkartoons film, Dizzy Dishes with Fitz the Dog, who was renamed Bimbo.
